services.label: Comprehensive Financial Services
services.desc: GOOLLUCK INVESTMENTS serves as your reliable and comprehensive financial service provider. We understand the importance of your financial goals and strive to offer tailored solutions. With years of industry experience, we are committed to assisting individuals and businesses in achieving financial success.

services.label: Leading Financial Training Institute
services.desc: As a leading financial training institute, we are dedicated to empowering individuals and professionals. Our focus is on providing knowledge and skills essential for excelling in the dynamic world of finance. Through a commitment to excellence, innovation, and a passion for education.

leftReviews.name: Mehar
leftReviews.body: Live market sessions with real-life lessons.An amazing experience overall. I am using the strategies Taught, so far consistent Profits in the last 8 months, small losses but get managed with strategies.

leftReviews.name: Kunj
leftReviews.body: Highly professional and experienced people, greatly knowledged about financial markets & trading.

leftReviews.name: Varun
leftReviews.body: I recently completed a stock market coaching program and it was transformative. The coach provided in-depth insights into market trends and strategies tailored to my experience level. Their hands-on approach and real-time market analysis greatly boosted my confidence and skills. I appreciate the personalized attention and the supportive community of fellow learners. Highly recommend for anyone looking to enhance their trading knowledge and skills!

leftReviews.name: Palak
leftReviews.body: My interest in Stock Market was first came from my father after that i was taking classes from Rohit sir i have decided to make my carrier in this field.I am highly recommended the Goolluck investment as they taught 75%of practical knowledge through which we can see live market snerio.They have unique strategies taught for stock picking based on tried and tested experiences and the taught the best way to handle the portfolio with higher returns and lower risk….

leftReviews.name: Deepti
leftReviews.body: One of a kind institute, with an unusual way of developing financial wisdom. It does not just focus on the micros of trading but equally stresses on the macros of investments and wealth building. There is a personalised approach towards what works best for ones goals. The trainings are quite hands on and very quickly you hit the ground running while learning along the way. Continuous support provided through your learning journey. The entire team is quite warm and approachable. Totally recommend if you are looking for a financial game changer.

leftReviews.name: Shashank
leftReviews.body: If you want trading with peace of mind and least possible risk, then this is your go to place.I am telling this basis personal experience.I would highly recommend this firm to everyone.

about.heading: Our Company
about.aboutCompany: Goolluck Investments is a portfolio advisory firm and stock market training institute. Here, you will learn about real time trading and strategies used by the traders of our institution. Learn directly from trader. Come & learn directly from traders.
about.desc: Possesses over 20+ years of Stock Market Investing Experience. 19 Times winner of CNBC Bulls Eye Contest (Best Portfolio Manager Contest in the Country). Derivatives Expert with Zee Business Live News Channel. Equity Expert with Investor India Magzine. Former Trainer at State Street Corp US for Hedge fund Training. Ex-National Head for Stock Broking Arm of Bajaj Capital.

team.name: Jaya Srivastava
team.desc: Seasoned professional with 10+ years of work experience in stock broking firm. MBA finance Stock market enthusiasts, expertise on managing and advising on wealth creation. Believes in nurturing the long term financial relationship

team.name: Bharti
team.desc: MBA in Finance, 9+ years of experience in Stock Market. Transparency, integrity, and open communication define my client relationships, Let's work together to turn your financial aspirations into a reality.

team.name: Mansi
team.desc: Bcom (Hons.), MBA in finance, 5+ years of experience in the stock market, BSE certified in Financial Market course, I am committed to helping you achieve your unique financial goals and dreams, My mission is to simplify complex financial charts and make them work for you

team.name: Yash Madan
team.desc: Mathematics major with 4+ years experience in financial markets, Focused on designing investment strategies that minimises the risk of markets, Keeping the investments safe is the top priority, Let me help you create a portfolio that lets you retire early.

team.name: Vidhi
team.desc: B.SC(H) Mathematics, 2+ Year Experience in Stock Market, My mission is to craft personalized financial strategies for your unique journey to prosperity. Beyond advice, we offer a roadmap to financial freedom and confidence

team.name: Deepti khatri
team.desc: Rooted in multi faceted experience, I prioritise investments to enrich lives and secure futures. The right relationship is everything-with finances & people.

team.name: Deepti Attreja
team.desc: M.Com, MBA in finance, Diverse 8+ years of experience in financial sector, I stay at the forefront of industry trends, ensuring your financial plan adapts to the ever-changing market, Your financial well-being is my priority; let's work together to secure your future.

team.name: Ritu Rai
team.desc: Join a community of empowered individuals who are transforming their financial lives under my guidance. Every financial decision you make is a building block toward your dreams; let's build together, Contact me today for a consultation, and let's embark on a journey to financial prosperity.

team.name: Palak
team.desc: BBA and PGDM in finance, 2+ years of experience in Stock Market, Transparency is at the core of my client relationships, ensuring you are informed every step of the way. As your financial ally, I am committed to turning your financial goals into achievable milestones.
